resources.string: A service that helps charity when you shop online.
Doesn’t cost you extra, the webshop will transfer a percentage of your purchase to charity.
Hi there, what is your e-mail address?
We need your e-mail to link your purchases to your account.
To whom would you like to contribute?
You\'re all set. Start shopping while making the world a better place
These shops donate when you shop.
Select the bank you use for shopping:
Your data will be protected and will never be shared.
Do you want to link your bank account to see how much the shops have donated to your charity?
